You can now snag this display for your battlestation for $849.99 shipped. This is one of the more pricey models in Samsung’s Odyssey lineup that hit the scene carrying a $2,000 price tag last year. It has more recently been going for $1,800 at Amazon and Samsung, and today’s deal shaves $950 off to mark a wild 52% discount. items.title: Estella’s top pet deals of the week: Up to 30% off Native Pet, up to 15% off Benebone, discounts on Swiffer, Blue buffalo, more
items.summary:
9to5Toys mascot Estella the Frenchie is back at it again, sniffing out this week’s deals and serving up some seriously solid savings. This puppy tracked down promo codes, limited-time discounts, and everyday price drops on some of the top names in pet care, making now a great time to stock up on essentials while the deals are live.

See below a 25% off promo code on Purina Pro Plan, savings on favorites like Benebone and Native Pet, plus a buy two, save 20% offer across other top pet brands. Whether you’re loading up on food, grabbing a long-lasting chew toy, or adding supplements to your pup’s routine, it’s an easy way to bundle and save in one shot.

There’s also a limited-time offer that takes $15 off when you spend $75 on household staples from brands like Swiffer, Dawn, Cascade, and Febreze. If you’re already planning a restock on pet cleaning supplies, this is a simple way to shave a little extra off the total.

As always, these deals won’t stick around forever, so you might want to fetch them while you can.
Check out even more great deals here.
